```{r, Viz, warning=FALSE}
plant.type.hist <- ggplot(focal, aes(x=treatment)) +
  geom_histogram(stat = "count") +
  facet_grid(.~experiment) +
  theme_classic()

  geom_histogram(stat = "count") +
  facet_grid(.~experiment) +
  theme_classic() +
  theme(axis.text.x - element_text(angle = 90))
behav.hist
```
